file_content.text: Spirits curse all your blood.
Stop it--stop! No more. Jawas is no more fighting.
For what do so many outsiders fight here?
For what is strong Jedi-Sith shaman do this?
For what is strong stranger warrior here to?
Did you really think you could get away with raising an army against the Empire?
I will stop this rebellion.
I don't have to justify myself to vermin like you.
Silence!
Empire look at Jawas, see slaves. I see this, yes. In the sleep-seeing. Jawa people in chains, all desert gone to Empire.
Is no choice, no? Must save Jawa people.
Maybe... you come for bargain, yes? Save Jawa people, and we give Empire many droids, good repair.
Hold out your hands. I'm taking you alive.
We're not negotiating.
All I want from you is your corpse.
Shut up and die.
Sith doctors are very curious about the source of your powers.
The Empire just wants you.
No! Is sin! Big-bad! Never ask spirits who to favor.
Is better die. Better kill me now.
Lelek not go with you alive! To aid, Jawa men! We fight!
We're past negotiating.
Turn yourself in.
Don't bother surrendering.
No! To aid, Jawa men! We fight!
You're coming with me.
I come, and no kill people, yes?
Lelek go in peace. Go to Empire, save Jawa people. Spirits ask this. Lelek not afraid.
Spirits tell you begone! Gone!
